DOC.brief_summary: Determine effectiveness of various antimicrobial solutions on burn wounds (infections, wound healing, length of hospital stay).
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Treatment of Burn Wounds With Antimicrobial Topical Soaks
DOC.detailed_description: Patients were treated with both Sulfamylon soaks and Silver nitrate soaks on different burn areas. These two areas were then compared for incidence (percentage) of infections.
DOC.criteria: Burn Injury requiring excisional therapy Hospitalization required until wounds are closed Known hypersensitivity to products Outpatient treatment for burn injury
